metadata.title: CVE-2023-52601 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:jfs: fix array-index-out-of-bounds in dbAdjTreeCurrently there is a bound check missing in the dbAdjTree whileaccessing the dmt_stree. To add the required check added the bool is_ctlwhich is required to determine the size as suggest in the followingcommit.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
